popupConfirmLostPhraseTextWindows:
Entendemos qu√£o importante √© sua chave, mas o Anytype n√£o guarda uma c√≥pia dela. A sua chave foi gerada no seu dispositivo e salva automaticamente no Gerenciador de Credenciais do Windows. Siga estes passos para recuper√°-la.:

  • Abra o Painel de Controle e altere 'Exibir por' para "√çcones grandes".
  • Localize e abra o aplicativo "Gerenciador de Credenciais".
  • Clique na aba "Credenciais do Windows" para visualizar suas credenciais salvas.
  • Busque pela entrada relacionada a Anytype e clique em "Editar" para visualizar detalhes.
popupConfirmLostPhraseTextLinux:
Entendemos qu√£o importante √© sua chave, mas o Anytype n√£o guarda uma c√≥pia dela. A sua chave foi gerada no seu dispositivo e salva automaticamente no Chaveiro do Linux. Siga estes passos para recuper√°-la:

  • Abra o aplicativo "Senhas e Chaves", que deve ser encontrado na pasta de Utilidades.
  • Na janela de "Senhas e Chaves", selecione o "Chaveiro" padr√£o no lado esquerdo.
  • Busque pela entrada relacionada a Anytype e fa√ßa duplo-clique nela.
  • Clique no √≠cone de chave para revelar a chave, ou pressione a op√ß√£o "Copiar" para copiar a chave.

Copie a chave e guarde-a de forma segura.
popupConfirmLostPhraseTextMac:
Entendemos como sua chave √© importante, mas o Anytype n√£o guarda uma c√≥pia dela. A sua chave foi gerada no seu dispositivo e salva automaticamente no Keychain Access do macOS. Siga estes passos para recuper√°-la:

  • Abra o aplicativo Keychain Access, que pode ser encontrado na pasta de Utilidades
  • Na janela do Keychain Access, selecione "Login" da lista de Keychains do lado esquerdo.
  • Clique na aba "Senhas" para visualizar suas senhas salvas.
  • Busque pela entrada relacionada a Anytype e fa√ßa suplo-clique sobre ela.
  • Marque a caixa "Exibir Senha", e a sua chave ser√° exibida.

Copie a chave e guarde-a de forma segura.

Voc√™ est√° usando a nova e melhorada vers√£o de Anytype.

popupMigrationImportText3: Em caso de problemas, voc√™ pode repetir o processo de migra√ß√£o usando o antigo aplicativo da √°rea de trabalho ou visitar nosso f√≥rum da comunidade.
popupPhraseLabel1: Your key is represented by a recovery phrase ‚Äî 12 random words that generate your vault on this device.
popupPhraseSubTitle2: Whoever has the key, has access
popupPhraseLabel2: Anyone who knows these words can access your vault. Right now, you are the only person in the world who knows them.
popupPhraseLabel3: All computational resources on Earth are not enough to break in. If you lose your key, it cannot be recovered. Store it somewhere safe ‚Äî in a password manager or written down on paper.

survey0Text: Hi there! We hope you're enjoying your experience in Anytype! We'd love to hear your feedback so we can keep improving the product.
survey1Text: Adorar√≠amos saber porqu√™ voc√™ escolheu excluir seu cofre. Poderia nos ajudar a melhorar em apenas 3 minutos?
survey2Text: Ol√°! Adorar√≠amos se voc√™ nos ajudasse a melhorar o Anytype participando desta pesquisa de 5 minutos.
survey3Text: Ol√°, esperamos que esteja gostando da sua experi√™ncia com o Anytype! Teria 5 minutos para nos ajudar a melhorar o nosso produto?
survey4Title: Melhore o Anytype com seu feedback
survey4Text: Responda nossa pesquisa de 1 minuto para aprimorar o compartilhamento de espa√ßos. Sua opini√£o torna o Anytype melhor para todos.

sidebarMenuSpaceCreateDescriptionImport: Transfira seus dados de outro aplicativo
deletedBanner: Este Objeto est√° na lixeira e est√° sendo exibido em modo de leitura
onboardingMainGraph11: Espa√ßo √© na sua ess√™ncia um gr√°fico, e o alvo do Anytype √© prover um caminho natural do pensamento, onde tudo √© representado por objetos com rela√ß√µes espec√≠ficas, exatamente como no mundo real.
onboardingMainObject:
Description now exists in every object;
you can hide or show it whenever you want.
onboardingMainType: You can match the object settings to the Type settings with just one click.
onboardingStoreType11: This Library contains all types of Objects and Properties. It comes with preinstalled types, as well as types that can be uploaded to Anytype for different use cases.
onboardingStoreType21: Voc√™ pode criar tipos com qualquer layout de objeto para prop√≥sitos pr√≥prios. Adicionalmente, voc√™ pode salvar qualquer objeto existente como um modelo de biblioteca se precisar us√°-lo frequentemente.
onboardingStoreType22: Now, let's take a look at the Properties menu.
onboardingStoreRelation11: Properties are reusable links with meaning. Here you can see some examples of Properties, but the idea is that you can create your own Properties which are valuable to you and connect the Objects through them.
onboardingStoreRelation21: Establishing relations helps you to understand the graph and its structure better. You can also create Collections or Sets based on the relationships for quick access.
onboardingTypeDeleted1Description: Se voc√™ quiser continuar usando este Objeto, altere o seu Tipo.
onboardingSourceDeleted1Title: Please check your Installed Types & Properties
onboardingSourceDeleted1Description: Some Objects in this Query use Types or Properties that have been removed from your Space. Visit the Library to re-install these entities and continue using your Set.
onboardingInlineSet1Description: Congratulations! You can embed a Query or Collection and modify it using Filters and Views without altering the original instance.
onboardingInlineSet2Description: Ajuste r√©guas e exibi√ß√µes para se adequarem ao atual contexto.
onboardingInlineCollection1Description: Congratulations! You can embed a Query or Collection and modify it using filters and views without altering the original instance.
onboardingInlineCollection2Description: Ajuste r√©guas e exibi√ß√µes para se adequarem ao atual contexto.
onboardingDefaultTypeDescription: Voc√™ pode alterar o tipo e o modelo de um novo objeto neste menu.
onboardingTemplateSelectDescription: Mude facilmente seus modelos ao criar objetos.
onboardingSpacesText: This is your Space. Click here to share it with others, customize its name and icon, or securely migrate from other apps.
onboardingPinnedNewText: Pin what matters most. Pinned keeps your key objects close at hand. Choose the layout that fits you ‚Äî lists, boards, or calendars.
onboardingObjectsNewText: Organize with Types. Each object has a Type. Think of it as a super-tag that keeps things organized: Pages, Tasks, or any custom type you create. New objects automatically land in their category here.
onboardingPinnedOldText: Your Widgets are Now the ‚ÄòPinned‚Äô Section We‚Äôve organized your sidebar widgets into the Pinned section, which is now your dedicated home for shortcuts. Your previous pins are preserved in old Pinned widget. You can re-pin your favorites from there and then remove the old widget when you‚Äôre ready.
onboardingObjectsOldText: All your Objects, by Type This section gathers all your objects into containers based on their Type. It‚Äôs the new, unified place to see everything you‚Äôve made.
onboardingMembershipText: Join the Anytype Network through a membership plan. Explore our paid features or simply support our work. We're here because of you.
onboardingSyncStatusText: Veja a sua rede e o status de conex√£o ponta-a-ponta aqui, juntamente com a lista de objetos sincronizados.
onboardingMobileText: Sincronize com os seus dispositivos m√≥veis localmente. Escaneie o c√≥digo QR para baixar o aplicativo para iOS ou Android e usar a sincroniza√ß√£o ponta-a-ponta.
onboardingCollectionsText: Create an object in the Collection. Use Collections to store and organise handpicked objects and files.
onboardingCollaborationText: Check out the new Collaboration category to explore experiences that help you co-create, share and collaborate.
onboardingChatsDescription: Anytype now supports real-time chat in Shared Channels ‚Äî so your thoughts and dialogues can grow together.
onboardingChatsMockChatMessage0: Good to have chat here now
onboardingChatsMockChatMessage1: Yeah. Just created something from this
onboardingChatsMockChatMessage3: Feels like part of the space ü´ß
onboardingChatsSlide0Text:
Spaces and Chats now show live previews and updates ‚Äî one
place to follow everything that matters.
onboardingChatsSlide1Text:
A channel made for dialogue ‚Äî where you can share, create, and
edit together in real time.
onboardingChatsSlide2Text:
Objects, lists and files appear in the sidebar ‚Äî structured,
searchable, and always at hand.
onboardingChatsSlide3Title:
See all the latest updates and bug
fixes in the release notes
onboardingPrimitivesDescription: Important changes to how things work in Anytype
onboardingPrimitivesSlide0Text:
Object Types now define properties and layout. Any changes at
the type level apply to all objects of that type
onboardingPrimitivesSlide1Text:
Properties are now managed at the type level, while local
properties stay on the object level
onboardingPrimitivesSlide2Text:
Every type has a built-in list of its objects. You can also auto-
create a widget when a new object of this type is added.
onboardingPrimitivesSlide3Text:
Templates no longer define properties or layout. They inherit object
settings and only control content and default property values.
onboardingPrimitivesSlide4Title:
See all the latest updates and bug
fixes in the release notes
